file_insights.changes: Added klaviyo_router import and registered router with FastAPI app
Added klaviyo_router import and exported in __all__

patterns_discovered.description: Consistent pattern of importing routers from submodules and registering them with FastAPI using include_router
Routes package uses __init__.py to centralize imports and export routers via __all__
All routers registered with identical '/api' prefix for consistent API versioning

gotchas_discovered.description: Router imports in __init__.py must precede __all__ declaration; failure to maintain this order causes NameError
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure all new routers are imported before being added to __all__

gotchas_discovered.description: Routers must be registered in two places: module __init__.py exports and main.py include_router calls
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Create checklist verifying both registration locations when adding new routers

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully integrated Klaviyo router into FastAPI application

recommendations.rationale: Manual dual-registration increases error risk; consider automating router discovery
Ensure future developers understand the two-step registration process

recommendations.recommendation: Add Unit Test for Router Registration
recommendations.rationale: Verify all routers are properly registered and accessible via API prefix
